original_title: History of the Organ: Vol. 1: Latin Origins
overview: Explore one of the world's most beautiful and complicated instruments with this superb four-part series that covers topics including the history of the organ, its astonishing musical range, the skill required to build the instrument and more. The program showcases music by Pierre Attaignant, Antonio de Cabezon, Girolamo Frescobaldi, Francisco Correa de Arauxo, Fran√ßois Couperin, Nicolas de Grigny and Louis-Claude Daquin.
title: History of the Organ: Vol. 1: Latin Origins
